vattenfall.name: Angular
vattenfall.description: Developing a strong frontend platform using nx, NgrRx Facades and responsive component.

vattenfall.name: .NET
vattenfall.description: .NET Framework was used to support the CMS Episerver, now Optimizely.

vattenfall.name: Azure
vattenfall.description: CI/CD pipelines are used to construct build-, deploy- and test workflows.

pwn.name: Angular
pwn.description: Angular was used to create a whole new SSR based frontend with over 5000 urls to support.

pwn.name: .NET Core
pwn.description: The backend was built in C#, enabling a headless structure. I was responsible for creating API endpoints to connect the CMS JSONAPI with the frontend.

pwn.name: Drupal
pwn.description: Setting up a headless Drupal 9 system from scratch and configuring the JSONAPI to work in a headless system.

hot.name: React
hot.description: I learned a lot about React in this project, sparking the passion that I now have for working with React. I was also responsible for a part of the state-management, using Redux.

hot.name: Redux
hot.description: Redux was used for standard e-commerce variables such as items in a cart, but also music related variables such as which song has to be paused.

avanade.name: Python
avanade.description: I really enjoyed creating a Python Package for Covid-data analysis, using a lot of Pandas.

avanade.name: TensorFlow
avanade.description: TensorFlow enables users to create all kinds of machine learning models. I mainly focussed on training LSTM models.

avanade.name: React
avanade.description: I used React to create a simple dashboard to show a few of my most important results.

uva.name: Django
uva.description: I learnt a lot about Django in combination with flask to create a basic restaurant website.

uva.name: HTML
uva.description: Working with Jekyll and Django templating learnt me that HTML is not just HTML, it's actually an amazing language.

uva.name: Sass
uva.description: I really love working with all kinds of styling. I like to challenge myself to write clean and efficient scss code.
